title: Celibet
description: When Beth gets dumped by text, sheâ€™s more irritated about being left without a ride, than losing her boyfriend of six years. With not feeling the heartbreak you are suppose to feel after a breakup, it tells her all she needs to know about that relationship.When her best friend and roommate Charlie, returns from Paris, after filming his debut movie, having also been screwed over. Then its time to get the drinks out.One drunken night, a scorching kiss later and the Celibet is made. Can they stay single for twelve weeks? Will their attraction to each other break their pact, or can they resist temptation?When fate intervenes and friendship turns into more, who will win the bet?
author: Stacy McWilliams
